mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE , M.MEMBER_NAME , M.MEMBER_AGE , M.BACK_NUMBER , M.POSITION , M.HEIGHT , M.WEIGHT , M.TEAM_CODE , T.TEAM_NAME , T.REGION FROM MEMBER M, TEAM T WHERE M.TEAM_CODE = T.TEAM_CODE
SELECT MAX(MEMBER_CODE) + 1 AS MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, BACK_NUMBER, POSITION , HEIGHT, WEIGHT, TEAM_CODE ) VALUES ( #{ memberName },#{ memberAge },#{ backNumber }, #{ position }, #{ height } , #{ weight }, #{ teamCode })
